headline: Wall Street Has a Mixed Opinion on Arch Capital (ACGL), Here’s Why
summary: ​Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) is one of the Cheap NASDAQ Stocks to Buy Now. On December 2, Harry Fong from Roth MKM lowered the firm’s price target on the stock from $125 to $110, while reiterating a Buy rating. Earlier on November 24, Rowland Mayor from RBC Capital initiated Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) […]
